dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy

dcterms:description: An open-source simulation environment for realistic and safe testing of vehicles driving in urban layouts, with humans and vehicles on the road following natural behaviours. The dataset was generated within CARLA using a custom wheelchair model.
dcterms:title: CARLA Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts

M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic urban scene understanding, used for training a segmentation network to provide scene information for trajectory prediction.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset
